Posts.Content:
Thank you for your reply. I went to the doctor and he said that the lump is not prominent enough to be a big concern, but I am getting an ultrasound in case.
I have benign hyperprolactinaemia.... in other words, high prolactin levels for no good reason. :-P
Posts.Title: Lump in right breast - like a pea

Posts.Content:
Hi everyone,
I was having pains in my right breast on Sunday night, like someone was stabbing me in the nipple and just below the nipple, slightly to the right, with a needle. When I went to bed, I did a check and found a lump that was like a pea or a bead about
 2 finger-widths away from my nipple to the lower right. The pain subsided yesterday evening, but I find that my nipple is still a little tender, although that could be from all of the poking and prodding! lol
I have "lumpy breasts", as stated by a doctor in university and I know that my mother has the same. She said that they gave her a term for it.... I guess fibrocystic breasts, or something like that. I do my regular checks and I know that this lump was not there before.
I called the next morning to make a doctor's appointment, but I am kind of wondering what it sounds like to people who may have more experience than me. I plan on telling him that I want to get it checked out, but what should I push for?
Thank you very much in advance!
Posts.Title: Lump in right breast - like a pea

Posts.Content:
forgot to mention a couple of things....
I have somewhat elevated prolactin levels.
I am supposed to start my period any day now.
